documents.name: Amazon Prime Video Terms of Use

points.title: This service is only available to users over a certain age

case.title: This service is only available to users over a certain age
case.localized_title: Ce service n'est accessible qu'aux utilisateurs ayant dépassé un certain âge.
case.description: The Services are intended for users who are at least a certain age. If you are younger than the age required then you are prohibited from using the Service.

points.title: This service tracks which web page referred you to it

case.title: This service tracks which web page referred you to it
case.localized_title: Ce service permet de savoir quelle page web vous a renvoyé vers lui
case.description: The service logs the URL of the last web page you visited before visiting the Site and may use that information to gather more data about you.

points.title: You can opt out of promotional communications

case.title: You can opt out of promotional communications
case.localized_title: Vous pouvez refuser les communications promotionnelles
case.description: You can update your account preferences and/or easily unsubscribe of email/sms lists to stop receiving promotional communications.

points.title: Your biometric data is collected

case.title: Your biometric data is collected
case.localized_title: Vos données biométriques sont collectées
case.description: This service can collect or use your biometric data. This includes but is not limited to facial recognition, fingerprints, and iris scans. Although this feature can sometimes be convenient to the user, providing this type of information to the service could open your personal data to being sold or stolen.

points.title: The service provides information about how they intend to use your personal data

case.title: Information is provided about how your personal data is used
case.localized_title: Le service fournit des informations sur la manière dont il entend utiliser vos données à caractère personnel
case.description: The Privacy Policy explains the purposes for which data is collected and the way it is processed, used and shared.

points.title: This service requires first-party cookies

case.title: First-party cookies are used
case.localized_title: Ce service nécessite des cookies de première partie
case.description: First-party cookies only belong to the domain of the service and not a third party.

points.title: Many third parties are involved in operating the service

case.title: Many third parties are involved in operating the service
case.localized_title: De nombreux tiers sont impliqués dans l'exploitation du service

points.title: You can request access and deletion of personal data

case.title: You can request access, correction and/or deletion of your data
case.localized_title: Vous pouvez demander l'accès à vos données personnelles et leur suppression
case.description: Users have the right to access personal data hold by the Service, correct it and/or permanently delete it. This usually applies to Services GDPR compliants.

points.title: This service can share your personal information to third parties

case.title: This service shares your personal data with third parties that are not essential to its operation
case.localized_title: Ce service peut communiquer vos informations personnelles à des tiers
case.description: Your personal data is or may be given to third parties nonessential to the service’s operation. This could be a business partner that receives your data to provide targeted advertisements.

points.title: The service can sell or otherwise transfer your personal data as part of a bankruptcy proceeding or other type of financial transaction.

case.title: Your personal data may be sold or otherwise transferred as part of a bankruptcy proceeding or other type of financial transaction
case.localized_title: Le service peut vendre ou transférer d'une autre manière vos données personnelles dans le cadre d'une procédure de faillite ou d'un autre type de transaction financière.
case.description: If the service gets acquired or is involved in a merger, bankruptcy, reorganisation or sale, your personal data may be transferred or sold.

points.title: Your profile is combined across various products
points.analysis: According to the excerpt, usage/activities from different apps will affect targeted advertising towards you. Your activities and overall profile are combined across the different products you may or may not own.

case.title: Your profile is combined across various products
case.localized_title: Votre profil est combiné à différents produits
case.description: When using multiple services from one same company, they can combine these (unrelated) information sources about you to build up a single richer user profile about you.

points.title: Blocking first party cookies may limit your ability to use the service

case.title: Blocking first party cookies may limit your ability to use the service
case.localized_title: Le blocage des cookies de première partie peut limiter votre capacité à utiliser le service
case.description: Most browsers allow users to set preferences related to cookies storage. You may choose to block all cookies (including first-party cookies), but it may impact your use of this service and you may not be able to access some or any of the features provided.

points.title: The service reviews its privacy policy on a regular basis

case.title: The service reviews its privacy policy on a regular basis
case.localized_title: Le service révise régulièrement sa politique en matière de protection de la vie privée
case.description: Users know the date the privacy policy was last updated and can thus infer the next time it will be reviewed. This gives users more certainty about how long they can trust the current policy to apply.

points.title: The service uses your personal data to employ targeted third-party advertising

case.title: Your personal data is used to employ targeted third-party advertising
case.localized_title: Le service utilise vos données personnelles pour utiliser la publicité ciblée de tiers.
case.description: Your Personal Information is traded and shared with advertising companies to target ads on you, either on the website you were visiting or in third party websites. Your interaction with the service and data you have shared with them may be gathered to create an advertising ID or profile.

points.title: The service provides details about what kinds of personal information they collect

case.title: Information is provided about what kind of information they collect
case.localized_title: Le service fournit des détails sur les types d'informations personnelles qu'il collecte
case.description: The Privacy Policy describes in detail the data collected through the website and through the services provided.

points.title: Third parties may be involved in operating the service

case.title: Third parties are involved in operating the service
case.localized_title: Des tiers peuvent être impliqués dans l'exploitation du service

points.title: Tracking via third-party cookies for other purposes without your consent.

case.title: Third-party cookies are used for advertising
case.localized_title: le suivi via des cookies de tiers à d'autres fins sans votre consentement.
case.description: The service's website sets third-party cookies (cookies that do not belong to their domain) for purposes not including statistics and analytics.

points.title: The service allows you to opt out of providing personal information to third parties

case.title: You can opt out of providing personal information to third parties
case.localized_title: Le service vous permet de refuser de fournir des informations personnelles à des tiers.
case.description: The Service provides opt-out instructions to the share of (some) personal information with third parties.

points.title: This service gathers information about you through third parties

case.title: Information is gathered about you through third parties
case.localized_title: Ce service recueille des informations sur vous par l'intermédiaire de tiers
case.description: This Service may employ, either identifiable or non-identifiable, data collection from third party sources about you.

points.title: This service may use your personal information for marketing purposes

case.title: Your personal data may be used for marketing purposes
case.localized_title: Ce service peut utiliser vos informations personnelles à des fins de marketing
case.description: The service may use your personal data for marketing, such as sending you personalised offerings.

points.title: This service reserves the right to disclose your personal information without notifying you

case.title: Your personal data may be disclosed to comply with government requests without notice to you
case.localized_title: Ce service se réserve le droit de divulguer vos informations personnelles sans vous en informer
case.description: If the Government governing the Terms requests personal data of a user of this service, they may not inform/notify the user while complying with the request.

points.title: This service collects your IP address for location use

case.title: Your IP address is collected, which can be used to view your approximate location
case.localized_title: Ce service recueille votre adresse IP à des fins de localisation.

points.title: This service provides archives of their terms of service so that changes can be viewed over time

case.title: Archives of their agreements are provided so that changes can be viewed over time
case.localized_title: Ce service fournit des archives de ses conditions d'utilisation afin que les changements puissent être consultés au fil du temps.
case.description: This case applies to Services whose agreements provide previous versions, so that users can compare them and understand how the Service seems to evolve regarding user rights.

points.title: The service provides a complaint mechanism for the handling of personal data

case.title: A complaint mechanism is provided for the handling of personal data
case.localized_title: Le service propose un mécanisme de réclamation pour le traitement des données à caractère personnel
case.description: The service provides users with contact information for an internal or external structure to lodge complaints. It also provides users with contact information for a higher data protection / privacy office in case the internal mechanism fails to satisfy the user.

points.title: Your private content may be accessed by people working for the service
points.analysis: If you upload files such as images, videos or others, the Service collects and may access that information.

case.title: Your private content may be accessed by people working for the service
case.localized_title: Les personnes travaillant pour le service peuvent avoir accès à votre contenu privé.

points.title: Users are entitled to a refund if certain thresholds or standards are not met by the service

case.title: You are entitled to a refund if certain thresholds or standards are not met by the service
case.localized_title: Les utilisateurs ont droit à un remboursement si certains seuils ou normes ne sont pas respectés par le service.

points.title: This service may collect, use, and share location data

case.title: This service may collect, use, and share location data
case.localized_title: Ce service peut collecter, utiliser et partager des données de localisation
case.description: Location-based information is collected and may be used and/or shared with third parties for purposes not directly related to the services provided (i.e. the Service doesn't rely on the use or share of location data to function properly).

points.title: Any liability on behalf of the service is only limited to the fees you paid as a user

case.title: Any liability on behalf of the service is only limited to the fees you paid as a user
case.localized_title: Toute responsabilité au nom du service est limitée aux frais que vous avez payés en tant qu'utilisateur.

points.title: You authorise the service to charge a credit card supplied on re-occurring basis

case.title: You authorise the service to charge a credit card supplied on re-occurring basis
case.localized_title: Vous autorisez le service à débiter une carte de crédit fournie sur une base récurrente.
case.description: You card will be billed on recurring basis unless cancelled. For instance, monthly or annual subscriptions.

points.title: Voice data is collected and shared with third-parties

case.title: Voice data is collected and shared with third-parties
case.localized_title: Les données vocales sont collectées et partagées avec des tiers
case.description: The service collects data and recordings of your voice when you communicate with a service verbally and may use and share them with third parties, that may use this data for marketing or advertising.

points.title: The service may use tracking pixels, web beacons, browser fingerprinting, and/or device fingerprinting on users.

case.title: You are tracked via web beacons, tracking pixels, browser fingerprinting, and/or device fingerprinting
case.localized_title: Le service peut utiliser des pixels de suivi, des balises web, des empreintes de navigateur et/ou des empreintes d'appareil pour les utilisateurs.
case.description: Tracking technologies (such as web beacons, tracking pixels...) are employed on users and/or the service assigns a unique ID to a browser or device to track its behaviour.

points.title: The service collects many different types of personal data
points.analysis:
Full quote: "What Personal Information About Customers Does Amazon Collect?

We collect your personal information in order to provide and continually improve our products and services.

Here are the types of personal information we collect: Information You Give Us: We receive and store any information you provide in relation to Amazon Services. Click here to see examples of what we collect. You can choose not to provide certain information, but then you might not be able to take advantage of many of our Amazon Services. Automatic Information: We automatically collect and store certain types of information about your use of Amazon Services, including information about your interaction with content and services available through Amazon Services. Like many websites, we use "cookies" and other unique identifiers, and we obtain certain types of information when your web browser or device accesses Amazon Services and other content served by or on behalf of Amazon on other websites. Click here to see examples of what we collect. Information from Other Sources: We might receive information about you from other sources, such as updated delivery and address information from our carriers, which we use to correct our records and deliver your next purchase more easily. Click here to see additional examples of the information we receive."

case.title: Many different types of personal data are collected
case.localized_title: Le service recueille différents types de données à caractère personnel
case.description: The service collects different kinds of personal data, such as name, demographic information, postal address, biometric data, device information, IDs, contacts, call logs...

points.title: The user is informed about security practices

case.title: Information is provided about security practices
case.localized_title: L'utilisateur est informé des pratiques de sécurité
case.description: It's important to know what security measures are taken to protect your data from unauthorized access. This case applies to the Agreements that precisely explain their security practices.

points.title: Users agree not to use the service for illegal purposes

case.title: You agree not to use the service for illegal purposes
case.localized_title: Les utilisateurs s'engagent à ne pas utiliser le service à des fins illégales
case.description: The user agrees not to commit any unlawful acts through the use of the website, including the posting of illegal content or messaging.

points.title: Invalidity of any portion of the Terms of Service does not entail invalidity of its remainder

case.title: Invalidity of any portion of the Terms of Service does not entail invalidity of its remainder
case.localized_title: La nullité d'une partie des conditions d'utilisation n'entraîne pas la nullité de la partie restante
case.description: Should any portion of the Terms of Service be unenforceable or invalid, that portion will be enforced to the fullest extent permitted by applicable law and the remainder of the TOS will remain valid and enforceable.
